name: Borbs
description:
Borbs (Bird) is a solo class project which I ran out of  time to work on. I wanted it to function like Cookie Clicker and with some extra mechanics to flesh it out a little more. But for my first solo game I’m just happy it works (well hopefully, it’ll work when you download it)

You’ll have to forgive the default unity text, as I said I ran out of time to tidy that sort of thing out, you'll also have to forgive lack of increase amount on the auto click buttons
